title: This is my offering
creator_credit: Stefanie Christian, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Stefanie Christian dedicates her story to the person who supported her throughout her illness, loved her unconditionally and helped her to envisage a bright future full of adventure.
